name: 3 Days Of Tactical Farming
description:
Info

This is a very short and small farming game! You are given a goal each day and you need to make that money before night-time!

At first, I was going to make it 5 days and add more diversity into the gameplay but due to other reasons, projects, and collaborations the work I could do was limited, however, I hope you enjoy it!

Controls

Controls and how to play guide is in the game itself

Dev Info

Developed by DevNugget using the Godot Game Engine.

Art assets made in Aseprite and music made in Jummbox.

Special thanks to ScriptLine Studios for play-testing!
